title: Runaway AI Is an Extinction Risk, Experts Warn
description: A new statement from industry leaders cautions that artificial intelligence poses a threat to humanity on par with nuclear war or a pandemic.

title: How to Polish Your LinkedIn Profile
description: While other networks sputter, LinkedIn is growing. Here’s how to use the professional social network to highlight your accomplishments and skills.

title: For Some Autistic People, ChatGPT Is a Lifeline
description: The chatbot can help rehearse communication skills and for some provides a resource to turn to when life is tough.

title: It’s the Age of Ozempic. Do We Need Weight Watchers Anymore?
description: CEO Sima Sistani is eager to leave problematic notions of weight loss behind and keep her company relevant in the midst of a drug-fueled revolution.

title: Fintech Unicorn Revolut Needs a Plan B
description: The company wants a UK banking license to move beyond payments and crypto. Regulators aren’t playing along.

title: Molly White Tracks Crypto Scams. It’s Going Just Great
description: In 2021, software engineer Molly White launched a cautionary Web3 blog to pour cold water on cryptocurrency's dumpster fires
